skills.title: Product Design
skills.description: Product design used to blend user needs with business goals to help brands make consistently successful products.

skills.title: App Design
skills.description: App design combines the user interface (UI) and user experience (UX).

skills.title: Web Design
skills.description: A web design is a plan or specification for the construction of an object or system or for the implementation of an activity or process.

skills.title: Development
skills.description: Development is the building and maintenance of websites and apps.

skills.title: Illustration
skills.description: An illustration is a visualization or a depiction made by an artist.

skills.title: Motion
skills.description: Motion design is a discipline that applies graphic design principles to filmmaking.
